description: This file provides utility functions for extracting and formatting version information from a given 'info' dictionary, including handling version strings and lists.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts the version as a list of three integers (major, minor, patch) from the 'info' dictionary, handling different formats and defaulting missing parts.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dotted string, e.g., '1.0.0', using the list obtained from GetVersion.
